dreisoft.tresos.tresosdb.api.model

Class DataModelAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • dreisoft.tresos.tresosdb.api.model.DataModelAccess

  • public class DataModelAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides support methods to access the tresosDB from within a DataModel. This class allows to extract tresosDB entities from a DataModel. E.g. the AUTOSAR system configuration and the software component template are mapped into a DataModel directly beneath the AUTOSAR root node at the path "XPath:/AUTOSAR/SystemModel". The system model entity IAUTOSAR can be query with: 
     IAUTOSAR autosar = (IAUTOSAR)DataModelAccess.getRootFromAutosarModel(IAUTOSAR.class, dctxt);
    Since:
    2008.b

      • getRootsFromAutosarModel

        public static java.util.List<IEntity> getRootsFromAutosarModel(DCtxt ctxt)
                                                        throws TresosDBException
        Query all tresosDB root nodes beneath the AUTOSAR toplevel nodes Via this method all System configurations can be found
        Parameters:
        ctxt - A context pointing the the DataModel that should be searched
        Returns:
        The root nodes of the model that implements the given type (never null)
        Throws:
        TresosDBException
        Since:
        10.1

      • getRootFromAutosarModel

        public static IEntity getRootFromAutosarModel(java.lang.Class<? extends IEntity> type,
                                              DCtxt ctxt)
                                       throws TresosDBException
        Query a tresosDB root node beneath the AUTOSAR toplevel nodes. Via this method a System configuration can be found.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the model root node
        ctxt - A context pointing the the DataModel that should be searched
        Returns:
        The root node of the model that implements the given type or null if none can be found
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2008.b

      • getRootFromAutosarModel

        public static IEntity getRootFromAutosarModel(java.lang.Class<? extends IEntity> type,
                                              DCtxt ctxt,
                                              java.lang.String name)
                                       throws TresosDBException
        Query a tresosDB root node beneath the AUTOSAR toplevel nodes. Via this method a System configuration can be found.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the model root node
        ctxt - A context pointing the the DataModel that should be searched
        name - The name of the entity (optional)
        Returns:
        The root node of the model that implements the given type or null if none can be found
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2008.b

        public static IEntity getEntity(DCtxt ctxt)
                         throws TresosDBException
        Query the IEntity instance of a node in a DataModel that represents an entity node of the tresosDB.
        Parameters:
        ctxt - The node that is an entry in the model
        Returns:
        The entity or null if the node does not represent an entity

                                throws TresosDBException

        Parameters:

                                  throws TresosDBException
        Query the autosar path of the node.

        The returned path without the 'ASPath:' prefix.

        Parameters:
        entity - The entity for which to get the path
        Returns:
        The path or null if path cannot be determined
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getEntityByPath

        public static IEntity getEntityByPath(IEntity root,
                                      java.lang.String path)
                               throws TresosDBException
        Returns the entity with the given path. Restriction: only works if the entity is contained in a data model of a project Note, that if the given path is relative and child is found, the method calls itself with the parent of the given root entity (this conforms to the Autosar specification). You may use getShortNameChildEntity(IEntity, String) instead.
        Parameters:
        root - The root entity to which the path is relative (not null)
        path - The path of the entity with 'ASPath:' or 'XPath:' prefix
        Returns:
        The first entity with the given path or null if entity could not be found
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - in case the given path is invalid (syntactically incorrect, e.g. contains spaces or an unknown prefix)
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getEntitiesByPath

        public static java.util.List<IEntity> getEntitiesByPath(IEntity root,
                                                        java.lang.String path)
                                                 throws TresosDBException
        Same as getEntityByPath(IEntity, String), but may return more than one entity (if path type/prefix supports such selection, like e.g. XPath: or ASTyped: does).
        Parameters:
        root - The root entity to which the path is relative (not null)
        path - The path of the entity with 'ASPath:' or 'XPath:' prefix
        Returns:
        all entities for the given path (immutable), never null, maybe empty.
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - in case the given path is invalid (syntactically incorrect, e.g. contains spaces or an unknown prefix)
        Since:
        15.0

      • getShortNameChildEntity

        public static IEntity getShortNameChildEntity(IEntity entity,
                                              java.lang.String childsShortName)
        Parameters:
        entity - The root element of the db model
        childsShortName - SHORT-NAME of the child
        Returns:
        the child entity of given entity with obtained childsShortName, if there is one - null otherwise

      • getEntityByASPath

        public static IEntity getEntityByASPath(IEntity root,
                                        java.lang.String path)
                                 throws TresosDBException
        Returns the entity with the given AUTOSAR short name path. Restriction: only works if the entity is contained in a data model of a project Note, that if the given path is relative and child is found, the method calls itself with the parent of the given root entity (this conforms to the Autosar specification). You may use getShortNameChildEntity(IEntity, String) instead.
        Parameters:
        root - The root entity to which the path is relative (not null)
        path - The path of the entity without 'ASPath:'
        Returns:
        The entity with the given path or null if entity could not be found
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - in case the given path is invalid (syntactically incorrect, e.g. contains spaces or an unknown prefix)
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getEntityByASPath

        public static IEntity getEntityByASPath(IEntity root,
                                        java.lang.Class<? extends IEntity> ifc,
                                        java.lang.String path)
        This method returns an entity with of a given type and with a given short name path. In contrast to { getEntityByPath(IEntity, String), this method works if the entity is not yet contained in a the data model of a project
        Parameters:
        root - The root node of the tresosDB model (not null)
        ifc - The interface type of the entity
        path - The full AUTOSAR short name path of the entity
        Returns:
        The entity with the given short name path or null if no entity could be found
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getEntitiesByType

        public static java.util.Set<IEntity> getEntitiesByType(IEntity root,
                                                       java.lang.Class<? extends IEntity> ifc)
        Returns the entities of a given type.
        Parameters:
        root - The root entity (not null)
        ifc - The interface type whose instances shall be returned
        Returns:
        All entities of the given type. Never null, maybe empty.
        Since:
        2009.a

      • getChildEntities

        public static java.util.List<IEntity> getChildEntities(IEntity root,
                                                       boolean recursive)
        Retrieves all children of a tresosDB node if recursive is set true, otherwise retrieves only direct children of a tresosDB node
        Parameters:
        root - a tresosDB node
        recursive - true to retrieve all children of a tresosDB node, false to retrieve direct children of a tresosDB node
        Returns:
        a list of child entities. Never null, maybe empty.
        Since:
        17.0

      • merge

        public static void merge(DCtxt ctxt,
                         IEntity sourceEntity,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         IMergeOptions flags,
                         org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                         APIOperationStatus status)
                  throws TresosDBException
        Merges the IEntity sourceEntity into the one that is already bound to the DataModel that ctxt belongs to. If there is no IEntity with the same class as sourceEntity and the name 'name' bound to the DataModel, one will be created. Uses DataModelAccess.MergeAlgorithm.LEGACY.
        Parameters:
        ctxt - A DCtxt pointing into the DataModel
        sourceEntity - The source IEntity to merge
        name - The name of the target IEntity
        flags - The flag that shall be used for merging
        monitor - Examines progress of a task
        status - an error-status is added in case, null is returned
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2009.a
        See Also:
        merge(DCtxt, IEntity, String, MergeAlgorithm, IMergeOptions, IProgressMonitor, APIOperationStatus)

      • merge

        public static void merge(DCtxt ctxt,
                         IEntity sourceEntity,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         DataModelAccess.MergeAlgorithm mergeAlgorithm,
                         IMergeOptions options,
                         org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                         APIOperationStatus status)
                  throws TresosDBException
        Merges the IEntity sourceEntity into the one that is already bound to the DataModel that ctxt belongs to. If there is no IEntity with the same class as sourceEntity and the name 'name' bound to the DataModel, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        ctxt - A DCtxt pointing into the DataModel
        sourceEntity - The source IEntity to merge
        name - The name of the target IEntity
        mergeAlgorithm - The merge algorithm to use.
        options - The options that shall be used for merging (depend on the merge algorithm)
        monitor - Examines progress of task
        status - an error-status is added in case, null is returned
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2009.a

      • merge

        @Deprecated
public static void merge(DCtxt ctxt,
                                      IEntity sourceEntity,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String mergerId,
                                      IMergeOptions options,
                                      org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                                      APIOperationStatus status)
                               throws TresosDBException
        Deprecated. please use merge(DCtxt, IEntity, String, MergeAlgorithm, IMergeOptions, IProgressMonitor, APIOperationStatus) instead
        Merges the IEntity sourceEntity into the one that is already bound to the DataModel that ctxt belongs to. If there is no IEntity with the same class as sourceEntity and the name 'name' bound to the DataModel, one will be created.
        Parameters:
        ctxt - A DCtxt pointing into the DataModel
        sourceEntity - The source IEntity to merge
        name - The name of the target IEntity
        mergerId - Specifies the merge algorithm to use (see DataModelAccess.MergeAlgorithm.getMergerId())
        options - The options that shall be used for merging (depend on the merge algorithm)
        monitor - Examines progress of task
        status - an error-status is added in case, null is returned
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2009.a

      • substitute

        public static void substitute(DCtxt ctxt,
                              IEntity entity,
                              java.lang.String name,
                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor,
                              APIOperationStatus status)
        Substitutes the IEntity with the name 'name' and the same class as the given IEntity with the given entity.
        Parameters:
        ctxt - A DCtxt pointing to the DataModel
        entity - The IEntity to substitute in
        name - The name of the IEntity to substitute
        monitor - Examines progress of task
        status - an error-status is added in case, null is returned
        Since:
        2010.a

                          APIOperationStatus status)

        name - The name of the IEntity to remove
        monitor - Examines progress of task

      • setRootOfAutosarModel

        public static void setRootOfAutosarModel(IEntity entity,
                                         java.lang.String modelName,
                                         DCtxt ctxt)
                                  throws TresosDBException
        Binds the db model beneath the given IEntity entity to the DataModel that ctxt points into
        Parameters:
        entity - The root element of the db model
        modelName - The name of the model (e.g. NAME_SYSTEM_MODEL)
        ctxt - A DCtxt pointing into the DataModel
        Throws:
        TresosDBException - is thrown by the tresosDB to indicate invalid calls to API functions.
        Since:
        2009.a
